name: Laser Madness: Super Mega Neo Ultimate Climax No Way Back Wars Deluxe Edition
name_original: Laser Madness: Super Mega Neo Ultimate Climax No Way Back Wars Deluxe Edition
description:
Created for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam, with the theme "Every 10 seconds"

Controls are "W A S D", "spacebar" and the left and right arrow keys "<- ->"

You control a spaceship equipped with a laser that can only fire once every 10 seconds! Survive, dash and destroy to gain a high score!

Play on Opera GX: https://gx.games/games/4ro3il/laser-madness/tracks/04340c45-f6ec-4f39-89bc-47ef9...

Credits:

Karsten Pedersen - game design, coding

JonasMG - game design, sound

We originally made a kingdom sim-city type strategy game, where a day was 10 seconds long, but ended up scrapping it 24 hours before the deadline. Then we made this instead!
